title: Tiffany Got a Takeover Bid from LVMH. Here Are Other Possible Bidders.
text:
Tiffany stock got a boost this week on hopes that it might agree to be acquired, and while Cowen & Co. is optimistic a deal could be struck, there is a chance it might not be the one Wall Street is expecting.

The back story. Tiffany shares (ticker: TIF) are up more than 57% year to date, more than double the S&P 500’s 21% rise, although a good deal of those gains are related to the shares’ big jump on Monday, on news of LVMH Moët Hennessy Louis Vuitton’s (LVMUY) unsolicited takeover offer of $120 a share. And while...
description: Cowen & Co. analyst Oliver Chen reiterated an Outperform rating on Tiffany and boosted his price target to $160 from $107. While he is optimistic a deal could be struck, there is a chance it might not be the one Wall Street is expecting.
